title: Chimera Trunk – Root Configuration Schema (chimera.yaml)
description: Validates the root project configuration for Chimera-Trunk. This file defines global settings and the assignment of actors to the TRUNK/BRANCH roles. The schema is intentionally minimal to uphold the MVP’s "linter for intent" philosophy and to keep cross-file validation deterministic.

version.description: The version of the chimera.yaml configuration format. Pinned to 1.0 for the MVP to guarantee validator determinism.

roles.description: Defines the actors (users or agents) assigned to the core roles. Actors are referenced via structured identifiers to ensure provenance across artifacts.

TRUNK.description: A list of actors who can assume the TRUNK role (strategists who define intent). Each entry must be a structured identifier of the form 'username:...', 'email:...', or 'agent:...'.

items.description: Structured actor identifier used for cross-file role checks.

BRANCH.description: A list of actors who can assume the BRANCH role (executors who implement the intent). Each entry must be a structured identifier of the form 'username:...', 'email:...', or 'agent:...'.

items.description: Structured actor identifier used for cross-file role checks.
